title: FYI -- Why I've been gone!
content:
Finally coming up for air after launching several major web projects. Nothing too interesting type-wise, probably enough for some rounds of bashing. Bash away friends!

Complete redesign of [GM Certified Used Vehicles](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422205919/http:/www.gmcertified.com/) site:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422205919im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CUV_homepage_5085.png)

Just for FUN! An interactive racing game for [Embarq Microsite](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422205919/http:/fullyloaded.embarq.com/) (click on "Man the Van"):

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422205919im_/http:/typophile.com/files/embarq_game_3469.png)
author: Norbert Florendo

comments.content:
Excuses, excuses. Tsk, tsk...I don't know how to tell you this Norbert...but looks like you need to start over! ;)

edit: I will probably get myself in trouble playing this game at work! Cool stuff!

Hmmm.... only 129 posts and I can beat Hrant again?  
What's happened to you guys, slacking off since I've been gone?
That’s a great web design. You did an excellent job combining a slick contemporary look with cool flash stuff while keeping the information carefully laid out and accessible.
Good to have you back. I took a hiatus myself, due to school work.

Love the website and the game. I'm impressed, Norbert!

Sharon
Thanks... it took a small army of creatives, programmers and flash ninjas working together. The old adage held true, "_If anything can go wrong, it will!_" and it did.

So what we <cite>really</cite> care about is: are you back for real now?

hhp

\> _are you back for real now?_  
The big question is _am I real to begin with_?
